message.body: Hey sunshine. Thanks for your message. :) I have a favor you may be able to help with... Are you busy around 12-1 tomorrow?
My car will be in use tomorrow! Fanchon is driving it to work. I'm also really sick right now :( did you find a ride yet?
I'm actually flying in today at 3, no luck finding anybody yet. I hope you feel better! :)
Oh, well I can do that then
I don't want to make you sick and I probably wouldn't be very talkative or anything, ha.

Oh man, thats so generous of you. Well let me see if I can get a hold of nick espinosa, he hasn't texted me back, but we'll see if he's around. I don't want you to be totally inconvenienced esp if you're sick
Ugh haven't got a hold of him. I'm sorry. If you could pick me up I'll get you some soup and give you love
Where are you and when do you need to be picked up? I need to change and stuff
Do you still need a ride, dear?
Sorry, I was in the air. I just landed and it's terminal 1 the big one.
Sorry to put a kink in your day!
Oh, no problem... I just wanted to make sure. Let's chat soon, baby- clearly we need to catch up! ;)
No not at all!
:) for sure! Just call when you're close?
Ok. I was confused! I thought you were flying out. I'm loopy and on meds, but I'll leave shortly.
Oh no, just got to mpls! Sorry!
Sorry, I'm an idiot and then when you didn't respond, I was like, oh, she found a ride. Fanchon has my car, but she'll be back soon.
Oh no worries and you're not an idiot, this days just been a mess!
On my way now!
Ok :) so nice to be back, im just relaxing
